title: NTP Ep. 20 - You Can Be Free from Body Shame with Jess Connolly
description:
Eating and exercise habits, stress or trauma, infertility or injury. How do you see your body? This is a candid conversation with my friend Jess Connolly about body shame.

You need her book on body shame: https://www.amazon.com/Breaking-Free-Body-Shame-Reclaim/dp/0310352460

Listen to the Bible anywhere with Dwell app: https://dwellapp.io/aff?ref=jennieallen
